name: Rushing Beat Shura
summary: After a few years from cyber clone incident, a new anxiety struck the people. Kidnapping amounting to hundreds, appearance of unidentified organisms, the emergence of combatants claiming a security team. These series of incidents show the influence of Kulmbach's Messiah Project. It turns out Douglas Motor Corporation is running Neo-Cisco into chaos and dispair. Dick and Norton head out to stop the menace once and for all.
